properties.displayName: All authorization rules except RootManageSharedAccessKey should be removed from Event Hub namespace
properties.description: Event Hub clients should not use a namespace level access policy that provides access to all queues and topics in a namespace. To align with the least privilege security model, you shoud create access policies at the entity level for queues and topics to provide access to only the specific entity
